an5.100:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme*.
an5.100:4.3: Tena kho pana samayena kakudho nāma koliyaputto āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa upaṭṭhāko adhunākālaṅkato aññataraṃ manomayaṃ kāyaṃ upapanno.
an5.100:4.5: seyyathāpi nāma dve vā tīṇi vā māgadhakāni gāmakkhettāni.
an5.100:4.6: So tena attabhāvapaṭilābhena neva attānaṃ no paraṃ byābādheti.
an5.100:5.1: Atha kho kakudho devaputto yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami;
an5.100:5.2: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
an5.100:5.3: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho kakudho devaputto āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ etadavoca:
an5.100:5.6: Sahacittuppādā ca, bhante, devadatto tassā iddhiyā parihīno”ti.
an5.100:5.8: Idaṃ vatvā āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
an5.100:6.1: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an5.100:6.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an5.100:7.1: “Kakudho nāma, bhante, koliyaputto mamaṃ upaṭṭhāko adhunākālaṅkato aññataraṃ manomayaṃ kāyaṃ upapanno hoti.
an5.100:7.3: seyyathāpi nāma dve vā tīṇi vā māgadhakāni gāmakkhettāni.
an5.100:7.4: So tena attabhāvapaṭilābhena neva attānaṃ no paraṃ byābādheti.
an5.100:7.5: Atha kho, bhante, kakudho devaputto yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
an5.100:7.7: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho, bhante, kakudho devaputto maṃ etadavoca:
an5.100:7.10: Sahacittuppādā ca, bhante, devadatto tassā iddhiyā parihīno’ti.
an5.100:7.12: Idaṃ vatvā maṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tatthevantaradhāyī”ti.
an5.100:8.1: “Kiṃ pana te, moggallāna, kakudho devaputto cetasā ceto paricca vidito:
an5.100:8.2: ‘yaṃ kiñci kakudho devaputto bhāsati sabbaṃ taṃ tatheva hoti, no aññathā’”ti?
an5.100:8.3: “Cetasā ceto paricca vidito me, bhante, kakudho devaputto:
an5.100:8.4: ‘yaṃ kiñci kakudho devaputto bhāsati sabbaṃ taṃ tatheva hoti, no aññathā’”ti.
an5.100:8.5: “Rakkhassetaṃ, moggallāna, vācaṃ<span class="var" title=" etthantare pāṭho sī , syā1-3, kaṃ, pā1 potthakesu natthi; 4V:1502 pana sabbatthapi" id="note269">.
an5.100:8.7: Idāni so moghapuriso attanāva attānaṃ pātukarissati.
an5.100:9.1: * Pañcime, moggallāna, satthāro santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an5.100:9.3: Idha, moggallāna, ekacco satthā aparisuddhasīlo samāno ‘parisuddhasīlomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddhaṃ me sīlaṃ pariyodātaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhan’ti.
an5.100:9.5: ‘ayaṃ kho bhavaṃ satthā aparisuddhasīlo samāno parisuddhasīlomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddhaṃ me sīlaṃ pariyodātaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhan’ti.
an5.100:9.6: Mayañceva kho pana gihīnaṃ āroceyyāma, nāssassa manāpaṃ.
an5.100:9.7: Yaṃ kho panassa amanāpaṃ, kathaṃ naṃ mayaṃ tena samudācareyyāma:
an5.100:9.9: yaṃ tumo karissati tumova tena paññāyissatī’ti.
an5.100:9.10: Evarūpaṃ kho, moggallāna, satthāraṃ sāvakā sīlato rakkhanti;
an5.100:9.11: evarūpo ca pana satthā sāvakehi sīlato rakkhaṃ paccāsīsati.
an5.100:10.1: Puna caparaṃ, moggallāna, idhekacco satthā aparisuddhājīvo samāno ‘parisuddhājīvomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddho me ājīvo pariyodāto asaṅkiliṭṭho’ti.
an5.100:10.3: ‘ayaṃ kho bhavaṃ satthā aparisuddhājīvo samāno parisuddhājīvomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddho me ājīvo pariyodāto asaṅkiliṭṭho’ti.
an5.100:10.4: Mayañceva kho pana gihīnaṃ āroceyyāma, nāssassa manāpaṃ.
an5.100:10.5: Yaṃ kho panassa amanāpaṃ, kathaṃ naṃ mayaṃ tena samudācareyyāma:
an5.100:10.7: yaṃ tumo karissati tumova tena paññāyissatī’ti.
an5.100:10.8: Evarūpaṃ kho, moggallāna, satthāraṃ sāvakā ājīvato rakkhanti;
an5.100:10.9: evarūpo ca pana satthā sāvakehi ājīvato rakkhaṃ paccāsīsati.
an5.100:11.1: Puna caparaṃ, moggallāna, idhekacco satthā aparisuddhadhammadesano samāno ‘parisuddhadhammadesanomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddhā me dhammadesanā pariyodātā asaṅkiliṭṭhā’ti.
an5.100:11.3: ‘ayaṃ kho bhavaṃ satthā aparisuddhadhammadesano samāno parisuddhadhammadesanomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddhā me dhammadesanā pariyodātā asaṅkiliṭṭhā’ti.
an5.100:11.4: Mayañceva kho pana gihīnaṃ āroceyyāma, nāssassa manāpaṃ.
an5.100:11.5: Yaṃ kho panassa amanāpaṃ, kathaṃ naṃ mayaṃ tena samudācareyyāma:
an5.100:11.7: yaṃ tumo karissati tumova tena paññāyissatī’ti.
an5.100:11.8: Evarūpaṃ kho, moggallāna, satthāraṃ sāvakā dhammadesanato rakkhanti;
an5.100:11.9: evarūpo ca pana satthā sāvakehi dhammadesanato rakkhaṃ paccāsīsati.
an5.100:12.1: Puna caparaṃ, moggallāna, idhekacco satthā aparisuddhaveyyākaraṇo samāno ‘parisuddhaveyyākaraṇomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddhaṃ me veyyākaraṇaṃ pariyodātaṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhan’ti.
an5.100:12.3: ‘ayaṃ kho bhavaṃ satthā aparisuddhaveyyākaraṇo samāno parisuddhaveyyākaraṇomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddhaṃ me veyyākaraṇaṃ pariyodātaṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhan’ti.
an5.100:12.4: Mayañceva kho pana gihīnaṃ āroceyyāma, nāssassa manāpaṃ.
an5.100:12.5: Yaṃ kho panassa amanāpaṃ, kathaṃ naṃ mayaṃ tena samudācareyyāma:
an5.100:12.7: yaṃ tumo karissati tumova tena paññāyissatī’ti.
an5.100:12.8: Evarūpaṃ kho, moggallāna, satthāraṃ sāvakā veyyākaraṇato rakkhanti;
an5.100:12.9: evarūpo ca pana satthā sāvakehi veyyākaraṇato rakkhaṃ paccāsīsati.
an5.100:13.1: Puna caparaṃ, moggallāna, idhekacco satthā aparisuddhañāṇadassano samāno ‘parisuddhañāṇadassanomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddhaṃ me ñāṇadassanaṃ pariyodātaṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhan’ti.
an5.100:13.3: ‘ayaṃ kho bhavaṃ satthā aparisuddhañāṇadassano samāno parisuddhañāṇadassanomhī’ti paṭijānāti ‘parisuddhaṃ me ñāṇadassanaṃ pariyodātaṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhan’ti.
an5.100:13.4: Mayañceva kho pana gihīnaṃ āroceyyāma, nāssassa manāpaṃ.
an5.100:13.5: Yaṃ kho panassa amanāpaṃ, kathaṃ naṃ mayaṃ tena samudācareyyāma:
an5.100:13.7: yaṃ tumo karissati tumova tena paññāyissatī’ti.
an5.100:13.8: Evarūpaṃ kho, moggallāna, satthāraṃ sāvakā ñāṇadassanato rakkhanti;
an5.100:13.9: evarūpo ca pana satthā sāvakehi ñāṇadassanato rakkhaṃ paccāsīsati.
an5.100:13.10: Ime kho, moggallāna, pañca satthāro santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an5.100:14.1: Ahaṃ kho pana, moggallāna, parisuddhasīlo samāno ‘parisuddhasīlomhī’ti paṭijānāmi ‘parisuddhaṃ me sīlaṃ pariyodātaṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhan’ti.
an5.100:14.2: Na ca maṃ sāvakā sīlato rakkhanti, na cāhaṃ sāvakehi sīlato rakkhaṃ paccāsīsāmi.
an5.100:14.3: Parisuddhājīvo samāno ‘parisuddhājīvomhī’ti paṭijānāmi ‘parisuddho me ājīvo pariyodāto asaṅkiliṭṭho’ti.
an5.100:14.4: Na ca maṃ sāvakā ājīvato rakkhanti, na cāhaṃ sāvakehi ājīvato rakkhaṃ paccāsīsāmi.
an5.100:14.5: Parisuddhadhammadesano samāno ‘parisuddhadhammadesanomhī’ti paṭijānāmi ‘parisuddhā me dhammadesanā pariyodātā asaṅkiliṭṭhā’ti.
an5.100:14.6: Na ca maṃ sāvakā dhammadesanato rakkhanti, na cāhaṃ sāvakehi dhammadesanato rakkhaṃ paccāsīsāmi.
an5.100:14.7: Parisuddhaveyyākaraṇo samāno ‘parisuddhaveyyākaraṇomhī’ti paṭijānāmi ‘parisuddhaṃ me veyyākaraṇaṃ pariyodātaṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhan’ti.
an5.100:14.8: Na ca maṃ sāvakā veyyākaraṇato rakkhanti, na cāhaṃ sāvakehi veyyākaraṇato rakkhaṃ paccāsīsāmi.
an5.100:14.9: Parisuddhañāṇadassano samāno ‘parisuddhañāṇadassanomhī’ti paṭijānāmi ‘parisuddhaṃ me ñāṇadassanaṃ pariyodātaṃ asaṅkiliṭṭhan’ti.
an5.100:14.10: Na ca maṃ sāvakā ñāṇadassanato rakkhanti, na cāhaṃ sāvakehi ñāṇadassanato rakkhaṃ paccāsīsāmī”ti.
